survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Drone Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used autonomous drone delivery services to assess their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and uncover opportunities for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using autonomous drone delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Set as a single-choice radio button question.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using autonomous drone delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of autonomous drone delivery did you find most appealing? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied preferences. Ensure the 'None of the above' option is included for respondents who may not find any aspect appealing.
questions.scripter_notes: Set as a multi-choice checkbox question.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of autonomous drone delivery did you find most appealing? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges did you encounter while using autonomous drone delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage respondents to provide detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Set as an open-text question with a text box for responses.

script.question_text: What challenges did you encounter while using autonomous drone delivery services?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use autonomous drone delivery services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Set as a single-choice radio button question.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use autonomous drone delivery services again in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the autonomous drone delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage respondents to provide detailed suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Set as an open-text question with a text box for responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the autonomous drone delivery experience?
